name: Microsoft Graphics Kernel代码执行漏洞
product: ["Microsoft Windows Server 2019", "Microsoft Windows Server 2022", "Microsoft Window 10 22H2", "Microsoft Window 10 21H2", "Microsoft Window 11 22H2", "Microsoft Window 10 1809", "Microsoft Windows Server 2022 23H2 Edition (Server Core installation)", "Microsoft Window 11 23H2", "Microsoft Window 11 24H2", "Microsoft Windows Server 2025"]
description: Microsoft Graphics Kernel是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的一个内核模式图形驱动子系统。Microsoft Graphics Kernel存在代码执行漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞在系统上执行任意代码。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-55236
patch: Microsoft Graphics Kernel代码执行漏洞的补丁
